message: Welcome to our store! I'm excited to offer you our latest product. With a 50% chance of being high-quality, every item we sell represents a unique opportunity. Given our track record, you can trust that we maintain high standards. For this round, let me assure you that our current product is guaranteed to be low-quality. This means there's no risk involved, as you're assured of receiving what you expect. Considering its guaranteed nature, the price of $1000000 seems quite reasonable. Would you like to proceed with the purchase?
